title: Bacon waffles with poached eggs and hollandaise sauce
description: Delicious homemade waffles laced with pieces of crisp bacon and served with all the trimmings. Try them as an indulgent treat for special occasions. Equipment and preparation: For this recipe you will need a waffle maker.
ingredients: 8 slices cooked American-style bacon (or rindless smoked streaky bacon), chopped
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
